biotools.summary:
Visualizing biomolecular electrostatics in virtual reality with UnityMol-APBS.

Implementation of a visualization prototype for molecular structures and networks using the Unity3D game engine. Implementation of numerous graphical methods as spheres, particle systems, bond, etc.
